name: Cyber Zone
overview: Place yourself in the centre of the action with Cyberzone. Superb animated graphics and arcade standard sound effects combine in a fast and furious game of skill and dexterity. Features alien scanner ships, deadly accurate cyber lazer, bonus laser bases, progressive difficulty level and unique voice activated laserfiring. Wipe out the leader of the notorious CYBER ZONE but avoid being pulverised into space dust by the CYBER's ultra-accurate laser fire. Avoid the swooping, spinning fighters coming to get YOU. Can you stay alive long enough to chip away at the floor of the CYBER's spinning spacecraft? Is your aim deadly enough to hit the CYBER's only vulnerable spot... the left foot!
